Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Establishes a mandatory training certification for all domestic and gender-based victim advocates
Summary: Establishes a mandatory training certification for all domestic and gender-based victim advocates.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to establishing a mandatory training certification for all domestic and gender-based victim advocates and creating the New York state gender-based violence training institute within the office for the prevention of domestic violence
